languages.text: Вы не приняли ключ от Тассеры из рук скомороха и ударили его.

traits.locale_text: Вы не приняли ключ от Тассеры из рук скомороха и ударили его.

languages.text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.
languages.original_text: Вы не приняли ключ от Тассеры из рук скомороха и ударили его.

traits.locale_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

languages.text: 宮廷道化師の手からタッセーラの鍵を受け取ることを拒否し、彼を叩いた。
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: 宮廷道化師の手からタッセーラの鍵を受け取ることを拒否し、彼を叩いた。

languages.text: Du hast es abgelehnt, den Schlüssel zu Thassera aus den Händen des Hofnarren zu akzeptieren, und ihn geschlagen.
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: Du hast es abgelehnt, den Schlüssel zu Thassera aus den Händen des Hofnarren zu akzeptieren, und ihn geschlagen.

languages.text: 你拒绝从宫廷小丑手中接过塔瑟拉的钥匙，还打伤了他。
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: 你拒绝从宫廷小丑手中接过塔瑟拉的钥匙，还打伤了他。

languages.text: Saray soytarısının uzattığı Thassera'nın anahtarını almayı reddedip onu vurdun.
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: Saray soytarısının uzattığı Thassera'nın anahtarını almayı reddedip onu vurdun.

languages.text: Vous avez refusé la clé de Thassera que vous offrait le bouffon et vous l'avez frappé.
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez refusé la clé de Thassera que vous offrait le bouffon et vous l'avez frappé.

languages.text: Te negaste a aceptar la llave a Thassera del bufón de la corte y lo golpeaste.
languages.original_text: You refused to accept the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands and struck him.

traits.locale_text: Te negaste a aceptar la llave a Thassera del bufón de la corte y lo golpeaste.
